trans-unit.source: Represents a text box control that can be hosted in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示可以承载于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell" /> 中的文本框控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl> class is a specialized type of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl> interface, allowing it to be hosted in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> when the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl>类是特殊的类型的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>实现控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl>接口，使其能够承载于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>当单元格处于编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing>事件时要执行的编辑控件的自定义初始化在单元格进入编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义控件的显示特征，设置返回的对象的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，而不是设置的属性返回的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This default constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此默认构造函数设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Application code typically won't explicitly create instances of this class, because this is performed automatically when the containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> is created.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码通常不会显式创建实例，此类，因为自动执行此操作时包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>创建。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> to use as the model for the UI.
trans-unit.target: 用作用户界面模型的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Changes the control's user interface (UI) to be consistent with the specified cell style.
trans-unit.target: 更改控件的用户界面 (UI)，使之与指定单元格样式一致。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 为此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl" /> 实例创建新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> instance that supports the ControlType UIA property.
trans-unit.target: 支持 ControlType UIA 属性的新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> object is only available in applications that are recompiled to target versions of the .NET Framework starting with the .NET Framework 4.7.2.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>对象选项仅适用于从.NET Framework 4.7.2 开始.NET Framework 的目标版本，将重新编译的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Applications that target an earlier version of the .NET Framework but are running on the .NET Framework 4.7.2 can opt in to this feature by using a compatibility switch.
trans-unit.target: 面向.NET Framework 的早期版本，但在.NET Framework 4.7.2 上运行的应用程序可以选择启用此功能使用兼容性开关。

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see [What's New in Accessibility in the .NET Framework](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility).
trans-unit.target: 有关其他信息，请参阅[What's New in.NET Framework 中的辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that contains the text box control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含文本框控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell" /> that contains this control; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if there is no associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />，它包含的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell" /> 包含此控件；否则，如果没有关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is automatically set when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> is created within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> or added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性时自动设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>中创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>或添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the formatted representation of the current value of the text box control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文本框控件的当前值的格式化表示形式。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the current value of this control.
trans-unit.target: 表示此控件的当前值的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Text%2A> property contains the actual data contained by the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Text%2A>属性包含实际包含由控件的数据。

trans-unit.source: The data is the string shown in the text box of the control.
trans-unit.target: 数据是控件的在文本框中中显示的字符串。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl.EditingControlFormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of this string.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl.EditingControlFormattedValue%2A>属性是此字符串的格式的表示。

trans-unit.source: Since a text box uses plain text strings, these two properties are essentially the same.
trans-unit.target: 由于在文本框中使用纯文本字符串，这两个属性是实质上是相同的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the owning cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置所属单元格的父行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that contains the owning cell; -1 if there is no owning row.
trans-unit.target: 包含所属单元格的行的索引；如果没有所属行，则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: The row index for the column headers row is -1.
trans-unit.target: 列标题行的行索引为-1。

trans-unit.source: The row index for a shared row is also -1.
trans-unit.target: 一个共享行的行索引还为-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current value of the text box control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示文本框控件的当前值是否已更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value of the control has changed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件的值已更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl.EditingControlValueChanged%2A> property is set to `true` to indicate that the owning cell's value has changed, and the cell may need to be updated to reflect this change in value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl.EditingControlValueChanged%2A>属性设置为`true`以指示所属单元格的值已更改，并且可能需要进行更新以反映此值更改单元格。

trans-unit.source: The owning cell or table will reset this property to `false` after it has updated itself.
trans-unit.target: 所属的单元格或表将重置此属性设置为`false`更新自身后。

trans-unit.source: When the control is initialized, this property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 初始化控件时，此属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> that represents the key that was pressed.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" />，表示按下的键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> wants to process the <c>keyData</c>; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 要处理 <c>keyData</c> 时，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key that the editing control should process or a special key that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> should process.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的键是应由编辑控件处理的常规输入键，还是应由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 处理的特殊键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified key is a regular input key that should be handled by the editing control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的键是应由编辑控件处理的常规输入键，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cursor used when the mouse pointer is over the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel" /> but not over the editing control.
trans-unit.target: 获取当鼠标指针位于 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel" /> 上方但不位于编辑控件上方时所使用的光标。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> that represents the mouse pointer used for the editing panel.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" />，表示用于编辑面板的鼠标指针。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts" /> values that specifies the data error context.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts" /> 值之一，它指定数据错误上下文。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 检索单元格的格式化值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the formatted version of the cell contents.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示单元格内容的格式化版本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged" /> event and notifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> of the text change.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged" /> 事件并向 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 通知文本更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to select the cell contents; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要选择单元格内容，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Prepares the currently selected cell for editing.
trans-unit.target: 准备当前选中的单元格以进行编辑。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> indicating the key that was pressed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> 指示键已被按下。

trans-unit.source: Processes key events.
trans-unit.target: 处理键事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key event was handled by the editing control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果键事件已由编辑控件处理，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method ensures that the ENTER key is ignored so that carriage return and line feeds aren't stored in the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可确保忽略 ENTER 键，以便回车符和换行符不存储在单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: This method also allows the cell contents to be selected when CTRL+A is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法还允许在单元格内容时按下 CTRL + A 选择。

trans-unit.source: for immediate callers to use this method.
trans-unit.target: 对于直接调用方使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell contents need to be repositioned whenever the value changes.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，指示是否需要在每次值更改时重新定位单元格内容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cell's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode" /> is set to <see langword="true" /> and the alignment property is not set to one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment" /> values that aligns the content to the top; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果单元格的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.WrapMode" /> 设置为 <see langword="true" />，并且对齐属性没有设置为将内容向上对齐的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment" /> 值之一，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
